articles.title: How to see Jupiter from our region as gas giant enters 'opposition' and closest point to Earth - Express & Star
articles.description: Jupiter is on average 391 million miles away from Earth, but because both planets travel in elliptical orbits around the Sun, the gas giant's distance from our home planet is constantly changing.
